title: A job for Jamie
author: VD
content_html:
Or anyone else who is interested. I would really like to get my hands on an Excel (or OpenOffice) spreadsheet listing all of the Dow, S&P 500 and NASDAQ-100 additions and subtractions dating back to 1985. I’m particularly interested in knowing the makeup of the first NASDAQ-100. If anyone has this information or feels like putting it together, I’d very much appreciate it.

Make sure the stock symbols are included. The closing price upon addition and subtraction would be ideal, but more than I expect. If you can set the entire thing to the tune of R. Kelly’s Remix of Ignition, I’ll be even more impressed.

This is the NASDAQ addition
CPKI is the kitchen
INTC rollin that body
Got MSFT here wishin


Vielen dank in avanti!
content_text:
Or anyone else who is interested.  I would really like to get my hands on an Excel (or OpenOffice) spreadsheet listing all of the Dow, S&P 500 and NASDAQ-100 additions and subtractions dating back to 1985.  I’m particularly interested in knowing the makeup of the first NASDAQ-100.  If anyone has this information or feels like putting it together, I’d very much appreciate it.
Make sure the stock symbols are  included.  The closing price upon addition and subtraction would be ideal, but more than I expect.  If you can set the entire thing to the tune of R. Kelly’s Remix of Ignition, I’ll be even more impressed.
